So if you've been following along with our

So in many of the other dim sum restaurants

come around to your table with push carts
and you're able to select what kind of Dim
Sum you'd like to eat.

But because we're here in Hong Kong and space
is so limited you have to order from a menu
and they just bring it to your table.

There is no way they can push a little cart
around in this small confined space.
